Title: Home
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Sharon Lee Watson, Gwen Sigan (story editor), Kinan Copen (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: When Intelligence busts a meth lab run by gang leader Marshall Carter, they uncover a re-homing scam in which children adopted from foreign countries are abandoned, then sold online. ...
